fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Customs, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives:
CA Technologies has an interest in current files; policy documents, legislative proposals and implementation of agreed proposals. 
 
REGULATION OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL on the protection of individuals with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data (General Data Protection Regulation) 
 
 
DIRECTIVE OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL on payment services in the internal market (PSD2 directive) and implementing EBA guidelines. 
 
The EU – US privacy shield 
 
Digital Single Market strategy and legislation or regulations that might follow out of the Strategy. 
 
COM(2015) 192 final COMMUNICATION FROM THE COMMISSION TO THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT, THE COUNCIL, THE EUROPEAN ECONOMIC AND SOCIAL COMMITTEE AND THE COMMITTEE OF THE REGIONS A Digital Single Market Strategy for Europe 
 
COM(2016) 180 final COMMUNICATION FROM THE COMMISSION TO THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT, THE COUNCIL, THE EUROPEAN ECONOMIC AND SOCIAL COMMITTEE AND THE COMMITTEE OF THE REGIONS Digitising European Industry Reaping the full benefits of a Digital Single Market 
 
Work relating to the contractual public-private partnership on cybersecurity and possible accompanying measures 
 
COM(2017) 9 final COMMUNICATION FROM THE COMMISSION TO THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT, THE COUNCIL, THE EUROPEAN ECONOMIC AND SOCIAL COMMITTEE AND THE COMMITTEE OF THE REGIONS "BUILDING A EUROPEAN DATA ECONOMY" Proposal for a 
REGULATION OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL on a framework for the free flow of non-personal data in the European Union  
 
COM(2017) 477 final/2 Proposal for a 
REGULATION OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL on ENISA, the "EU Cybersecurity Agency", and repealing Regulation (EU) 526/2013, and on Information and Communication Technology cybersecurity certification (''Cybersecurity Act'')

relevant_communication:
No specific events scheduled for the moment.  
 
In the execution of our pledge to the Digital Skills and Jobs Coalition, we will be organizing activities in a variety of EU countries to highlight need for more STEM focus.
goals__remit:
CA Technologies provides IT management solutions that help customers manage and secure complex IT environments to support agile business services.   
 
Organizations of all sizes leverage CA Technologies software and SaaS solutions to accelerate IT innovation through new technologies, transform infrastructure to reduce complexity and free up resources, and secure data and identities to reduce risk.  
 
We do this across all environments from the datacenter to the cloud and across the complete service lifecycle.  
 
CA Technologies offers a practical approach to help customers transition from maintaining IT systems to delivering new, innovative services and value through IT.  
 
CA Technologies delivers Business Service Innovation.
